description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Hadahaa, Maldives. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Pristine Maldives Private Island Villas with Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Experience luxury over the lagoon in the Maldives’ deepest atoll - the ‘Living Island’ of Hadahaa. Comprising just 51 villas across a private tropical island, this five-star resort whisks you away from reality and straight into picture-perfect paradise. Harness the holistic healing powers of The Vidhun Spa with a tension-melting massage, take a dip in one of the resort’s two freshwater pools, or sample culinary excellence at one of three on-site restaurants, including the overwater Koi at the Drift.

seo.title: Hotel a Hadahaa - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Hadahaa, Maldives con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
